name: Grilled Chicken Burgers

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Organic Mustard

preparation: Using Piano Wire Whisk, whisk egg with water, then whisk in seasoning and mustard.
Crumble in chicken and sprinkle with breadcrumbs. Mix to combine. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 6 patties, or use a burger press.

Grill patties on the barbecue over medium-high heat with lid closed for 5 min. Flip and continue grilling for approximately 5 more min, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 160Â° F.
tips: Flavour Changer: try prepared Epicure Roasted Garlic Aioli instead of Honey or Sweet & Spicy Mustard.
